header.description: Header text indicating the number of groups in the response and the total number of groups found in the search.

total.description: The total number of groups found in the search.

html.description: The group name with the matched query string highlighted with the HTML bold tag.

title.description: The title of the group label.

type.description: The type of the group label.

groupId.description: The ID of the group, if available, which uniquely identifies the group across all Atlassian products. For example, *952d12c3-5b5b-4d04-bb32-44d383afc4b2*.

description: The list of groups found in a search, including header text (Showing X of Y matching groups) and total of matched groups.
